me.projectx.thunderbolt2

Interface Thunderbolt

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ThunderboltManager

    public interface Thunderbolt
    An interface specifying available methods for developers
    Author:
    Daniel S. (The Gaming Grunts)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(java.lang.String name)
      Delete a file and remove it from memory.
      ThunderFile get(java.lang.String name)
      Get a file by its name.
      ThunderFile load(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String path)
      Load a file into memory.
      void unload(java.lang.String name)
      Unload a file from memory.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        ThunderFile get(java.lang.String name)
        Get a file by its name. Doesn't require .json extension. This method is thread-safe
        Parameters:
        name - : The name of the file to get.

      • load

        ThunderFile load(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String path)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Load a file into memory.

        NOTE: Make sure to call unload(String) when you're done using this file, otherwise a memory leak may occur!

        Parameters:
        name - : The name of the file to load.
        path - : The path to the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • unload

        void unload(java.lang.String name)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Unload a file from memory.
        Parameters:
        name - : The name of the file to unload
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • delete

        void delete(java.lang.String name)
     throws java.io.IOException
        Delete a file and remove it from memory.
        Parameters:
        name - : The name of the file to delete
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
